Articles.Content:
i wanna create something like this http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29191-For-Sale-Luxury-3-bedroom-house-with-Kacific-Views-(with-private-rover-plane)

i downloaded this craft file but i can't open it, even though i downloaded those parts he said (https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9436261/house%20and%20plane%20parts.zip) and put it in my GameData folder but it still doesn't work, can anyone help?

Yes, don't put it in Gamedata - it's a .craft (ship) file, so it needs to go in the Ships\VAB or Ships\SPH folder of one of your save games - then you open it in the VAB or SPH as appropriate. After that you'll have to launch and fly it to wherever you want it, which is unlikely to be easy!

Yes, don't put it in Gamedata - it's a .craft (ship) file, so it needs to go in the Ships\VAB or Ships\SPH folder of one of your save games - then you open it in the VAB or SPH as appropriate. After that you'll have to launch and fly it to wherever you want it, which is unlikely to be easy!

i know that dude, i put craft files in proper folder, but i'm asking for this mods and parts he said i need

The post you're referring to is roughly a year and a half old. Some of the mods that katateochi used might no longer be around any more. Others simply won't work in 0.24. And the mods that do work, like B9, have changed so much since that time that craft build on the old version are incompatible with the new.

I can only suggest two options: Build your own house. Or ask katateochi for help.

yeah, what Tex_NL said, ask this Katateochi chap....oh wait, that's me. erm, yeah, that's a dead craft file I'm sorry to say. I'm surprised the current KSP even starts with parts/plugins from so long ago!

To be honest building a house like that is actually quite easy (in the SPH and rotate it about to make use of different symmetries). Getting it somewhere, that's considerably more...kerbal!

The one in that post I flew with firespitter engines, since then I've found its easier to just strut the house to the top of a wide and stupidly powerful rocket, attach an unholy number of SAS units and parachutes to it, and then attempt to pilot it somewhere.

There's some pics of another house I made and pics of the "flight" out in this post. I'm not at my KSP machine right now, but I will try to find that craft file for you, cos it will be more current (still a couple versions old thou).
